title: Ariat Men's M4 Low Rise Boot Cut Jeans
description: Relaxed through waist, hip and thigh
Loop Lock reinforced rear belt loop

Ride, ranch or hit the town by wearing the M4 Boot Cut Jeans for men. Featuring a design that is relaxed through waist, hip, and thigh, these comfortable and durable western jeans are sure to create an authentic style statement. Made of ring-spun denim, these men’s jeans are machine washable using cold water and a light spin cycle. These jeans feature anchored belt loops, no-rub inseams for rash-proof wearing comfort and are fitted with heavy-duty zippers and hardware. It has handcrafted pocket designs with embroidered stitching that add more character. These have a stackable design that lets you create over-the-boot silhouettes. Moreover, the extra-deep front pockets of these jeans make sure your belongings stay safe and secure.No matter what you need, there’s an Ariat product made for you. Ariat works with global suppliers to develop new material that is lighter, cooler and more durable than anything else in the market. Every product, from hiking and work boots to western casual wear and English riding gear, gets field tested with people like you, enabling us to consistently raise the bar for functionality and style.Ariat is committed to building a different breed of company, one that reflects our core values as a team and those of our consumers. Our company values have shaped our success since 1993 ― a commitment to innovation, quality, integrity, teamwork and respect.
